item.title: CLF
item.description: score:-49 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs (CLF) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term Risks: The acquisition of United States Steel Corp. by the Japanese steel powerhouse Nippon Steel Corp. may pose a risk to Cleveland-Cliffs’ market position Score:-49 chances characters count - risks characters count = -49

item.title: X
item.description: score:-22 Chances: U.S. Steel Corp. has the potential for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Nippon Steel Corp. made an aggressive all-cash offer for United States Steel Corp., indicating potential for a high acquisition price. Risks: The acquisition bid from Nippon Steel Corp.
